name: Avatar of Death
languages: all languages known to its summoner

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

actions.name: Reaping Scythe
entries: The avatar sweeps its spectral scythe through a creature within 5 feet of it, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) necrotic damage.
